Description: Blue glazed composition reis shabti of Hor(em)akhbit with painted detail: a lappet-wig with black striations and a fillet, a modelled face, one arm hangs down the side, the other arm is held across the waist and holds a black whip, the figure is represented wearing a garment with short sleeves and a triangular apron inscribed with painted black hieroglyphs, the feet are separated and rest on a short plinth, the back is decorated with a representation of a black seed-basket.
